metadata.description: Email to send all notification for MOC Registration(Operations) expiration
Provides current environment base url. No back slash ending.

parameters.$filter: (ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null and (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),-30),'yyyy-MM-dd')}')) and _ovs_siteid_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null)

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Hello/Bonjour,

Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} expired 30 days ago.

Please use the following link to navigate directly to the operation:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}
___________________________________________________________________________________

Opération @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']} a expiré il y a 30 jours.

Veuillez utiliser le lien suivant pour accéder directement à l’opération:
Operation @{items('Iterate_expired_-_single_thread')?['ovs_name']}

parameters.$filter: (Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.On(PropertyName='ovs_registrationexpiry',PropertyValue='@{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}') and ovs_SiteId/_parentaccountid_value ne null and ovs_registrationexpiry ne null and ovs_mocregistrationname ne null and fdr_registrationtype/_fdr_standard_value ne null) and (ovs_SiteId/accountid ne null) and (fdr_registrationtype/fdr_containertypeid ne null)

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Transport Canada – Expiry Notice / Transports Canada – Avis d’expiration
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Your registration under number @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} expired on @{formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}. You are no longer registered, and any registered mark associated to this registration, shall no longer be applied.

Please advise us if you would like to close your file. To renew your registration, you must submit a renewal request .

Operation Type:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_englishname']}
Standard:  @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceetxt']}
Company Name:  @{outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname']}
Site address:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

If you have already submitted an application to renew your registration, please disregard this notice.
________________________________________________________________________

Votre inscription sous le numéro @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} a expiré le @{formatDateTime(utcnow(), 'dd-MM-yyyy')}.  Vous n'êtes plus inscrit, et toute marque enregistrée associée à cet inscription, ne doit plus être appliquée.

Veuillez nous aviser si vous désirez fermer votre dossier. Pour renouveler votre inscription, vous devez soumettre une demande de renouvellement .

Type d’opération:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_frenchname']}
Norme:  @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceftxt']}
Nom d’entreprise:  @{if(empty(outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr']),outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname'],outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr'])}
Localisation:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

Si vous avez déjà soumis une demande de renouvellement, aucune action n’est requise de votre part.

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Transport Canada –Renewal Notice / Transports Canada – Avis de renouvellement
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Your registration under number @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} will expire on @{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

Please advise us if you would like to close your file. To renew your registration, you must submit a renewal request .

Operation Type:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_englishname']}
Standard:  @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceetxt']}
Company Name:  @{outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname']}
Site address:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

If you have already submitted an application to renew your registration, please disregard this notice.
________________________________________________________________________

Votre inscription sous le numéro @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_mocregistrationname']} vient a échéance le @{formatDateTime(addDays(utcnow(),variables('InDays')),'yyyy-MM-dd')}.

Veuillez nous aviser si vous désirez fermer votre dossier. Pour renouveler votre inscription, vous devez soumettre une demande de renouvellement .

Type d’opération:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['fdr_registrationtype/fdr_frenchname']}
Norme:  @{outputs('Get_Standard')?['body/qm_legislationsourceftxt']}
Nom d’entreprise:  @{if(empty(outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr']),outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalname'],outputs('Get_Parent')?['body/ovs_legalnamefr'])}
Localisation:  @{items('Iterate_expiring_-_single_thread')?['ovs_siteid/address1_composite']}

Si vous avez déjà soumis une demande de renouvellement, aucune action n’est requise de votre part.
